issue.title: [R][CI] Remove flatbuffers from homebrew formulae
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7799](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7799). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-6634 vendored flatbuffers so these shouldn't be needed anymore.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7799?focusedCommentId=17032768) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6385
